title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 § 2053.13 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 § 2053.13 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, there shall be no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant to this

Part. (b) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, copies of records shall be provided: (1)
at a rate of up to 25¢ per photocopy of
up to 9 x 14 inches; or
(2)
upon
payment of the actual cost of reproduction. (c) The actual cost of reproduction shall be
based upon the average unit cost for copying a record, excluding fixed costs of
the corporation, such as operator salaries and overhead. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
§
2053.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
